name: Pizza Proletariat vs. Yeast Beast
description:
Take on the mighty Yeast Beast, a mutated monstrosity that has appeared in the center of the pizza. Take it down with an army of pizza toppings that can attack, defend, and generate cheese (which is needed to place toppings).

Credits

Simen Vegsund Dahl - Lead Programmer
Thorvald Rogne - Lead Designer
Jørn Hansen - Composer
Thomas Veierød - Artist & Animator
